[vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_zigzag][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

All About Brow Lamination

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

What is Brow Lamination?

Brow Lamination works similarly to a lash lift. It is a semi-permanent eyebrow trend that essentially involves straightening the brow hairs so that they all stay in the desired direction.

 

How long will it last?

Brow lamination is perfect for individuals who have a relatively good amount of brow hair and want to enhance their brows to give an illusion of thicker, symmetrical, and uniformed brows. The treatment lasts up to 6 to 8 weeks.

​

Can you put makeup on laminated brows?

As with any perm, the most important thing to do post-lamination is to keep your brows away from water, steam, and makeup for at least 24 hours.

 

 

How often can I have a Brow Lamination?

You can repeat the treatment after a minimum of 4 to 6 weeks or until your brow hair grows back into its natural state.

 

Pre-Treatment Procedures​

Arrive at your appointment with your eyebrows makeup-free. This includes a brow pencil or powder, concealer, and foundation.

Shower prior to your appointment, as you will be advised not to wet your brows for 24 hours to ensure the solution properly sets.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_zigzag][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

BROW LAMINATION STEP BY STEP:

 

Read all instructions if you don’t know anything about brow lamination.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Lucia Lash and Brow uses:

Less chemicals ◎

Less damage ◎

 

We use Thio-Free Japanese perming lotion, which is less damaging than regular perming lotion!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Step 1： Thio Free Perming Lotion

Apply carefully to one brow at a time, making sure to keep solution to hair area only. Cover brows with cling wrap to ensure the hairs are fixed in an upright position.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Step 2：Keratin and 2nd Solution

After leaving the solution on for your desired time, remove the cling wrap. Using a dry cotton tip, remove the solution from the eyebrows in an upwards motion, leaving no residue. Apply Keratin Nourish to both brows. Apply the 2nd solution to brows.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

STEP 3：Remove

After leaving the 2nd solution on for your desired time, remove cling wrap. Remove the solution in an upwards motion using a cotton tip, leaving no residue. Once clean, eyebrows can be waxed or tweezed to achieve desired shape.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

STEP 4：Tint (Optional)

Apply tint and remove when desired color/darkness is achieved. Apply Keratin Nourish and brush brows upwards.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”]Pricing[vc_empty_space height=”100px”]Appointment[vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_zigzag][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Microblading VS Brow Lamination

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Microblading is a more invasive and permanent eyebrow transformation that one might invest in for a brow look that will last for about 1-2 years. 

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

I want to get my eyebrows microbladed

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][vc_column_text]

Brow Lamination is less invasive and a temporary (6-8 weeks) perming treatment that might be a more affordable solution to achieve your desired brow look.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_zigzag][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

BROW LAMINATION

 

Eyebrow Lamination is a relatively new procedure that focuses on creating shiny, smooth brows. Brow lamination is a microblading alternative that fills in gaps in brows and provides fullness and growth in a fast, noninvasive way. 

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]Pricing[vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”]Appointment[vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_zigzag][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

EYE BROW TINT

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Regular Tint 

 

Brow tinting is a service that can take 10-15 minutes depending on the color you are trying to achieve. They are colored from root to tip, giving them a darker, fuller, and more enhanced/dramatic appearance. Tints can last about 2-3 weeks. 

 

Regular Tint      $30

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Henna Tint

 

Henna tint contains natural coloring components with organic compounds that are used to accelerate the process of dyeing eyebrows.  We have a wide range of shade palettes that will allow you to choose the perfect shade for coloring any eyebrows. 

 

Henna Tint         $40

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_zigzag][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_images_carousel images=”9655,9720,9721,9722,9723,9724,9725,9726″ img_size=”large” slides_per_view=”5″][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column][vc_zigzag][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Post-Treatment Care

 

・Avoid getting your brows wet for 24 hours after application. Avoid saunas, swimming, or heavy exercising that can cause excess sweating.

・Do not apply brow makeup and avoid self-tanning on the face for at least 24 hours after your treatment.​

・Gently comb brow hairs back into place daily.​

・Avoid oil-based products and cream around your brows.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row kd_background_image_position=”vc_row-bg-position-top”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”100px”]Pricing[vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”100px”]Appointment[vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
